name: Fuji Instax 50S Piano Black
description:
Check out our full eStore at: http://estore.peek-ture.com!

Elegantly dressed in a coat of shiny black, this instant camera takes fun, credit card sized snapshots that develop in less than a minute!

With its mysterious dark body, the Fuji Instax 50S Piano Black is one compact, cool and classy customer. Thanks to its automatically adjusting shutter speeds it works like a dream, even in low light conditions. You can even take photos of yourself or join in on group shots with the self-timer option!

Features:

• Credit card sized pictures that develop instantly
• Self-timer option available
• Close-up lens lets you shoot up to 30cm (2:1 magnification ratio)
• Lighten/Darken controls
• Built-in flash
• Uses Fujifilm Instax Mini Film

Comes with 1 year warranty from Fujifilm Singapore.

name: Camera Phone Lens (Fisheye/Wide Angle & Macro)
description:
Check out our full eStore at: http://estore.peek-ture.com!

These high-clarity glass cell phone lenses are like pro lenses for your camera phone, giving you crisp and clear shots every time.

They work with any camera phone and attaching them is easy breezy! A detachable magnetic ring sticks to your cell, providing a sturdy, shake-free hold between the lens and your phone.

The Fisheye Lens creates fun-tastic curved edges with a 180-degree angle that makes everyone look like they live in a plastic bubble.

The Wide Angle/Macro Lens is the perfect pairing. The removable Macro ring captures shocking high quality close-up detail while the Wide Angle Lens allows you to cram more into one shot.

Get the best out of your camera phone with these great lenses.

name: Impossible Project 600 Box Set Camera - Barbie
description:
Check out our full eStore at: http://estore.peek-ture.com!

This Polaroid 600 box set is all you need to start shooting! 1 camera + 2 packs of film = endless fun. Now featuring the awesome Barbie Edition Camera!

Limited stock of lovingly refurbished Polaroid 600 Close Up cameras together with 1 packs of the PX 600 Silver Shade UV+ film.

Please be aware that the camera model you receive might vary slightly in color tones and may show signs of its former usage.

PX images are sensitive to light during their first seconds outside off the camera. Shield the images from light immediately after their ejection from the camera and during the first four minutes of development to get stunningly colorful images.

Features

- Focus free lens
- Built - in - flash with auto-flash feature
- Focusing range, 0,6m - infinity
- The camera uses PX 600 and PX 680 as well as Polaroid 600 film

name: Fed 5 Original Case
description:
Check out our full eStore at: http://estore.peek-ture.com!

Here's an original black leather Fed case, almost 30 years old but in excellent condition!

Perfect armour for your Red Army Camera Fed 5B.

name: Fed 5B ONE
description: Check out our full eStore at: http://estore.peek-ture.com! This custom design is by Peek! peek! is proud to present the ONE camera! this camera was commissioned specifically for our first birthday, the most important milestone to date. peek! was established first and foremost as a photography store, a one-stop shop for analogue photography. but our dreams grew and we knew that we couldn’t stop there, so we set out to out-do ourselves, all within this eventful first year. this time last year, we proudly presented superheadz as our first showcase at peek!. this year we have outdone ourselves, collaborating with 2 big names, zouk and the impossible project to bring to you an exhibition of internationally epic proportions! we’ve managed to get world renown artists to be a part of our show, including celebrity photographers, big in-house names and more. all this because they share the same love for photography that we have and are trying to spread in singapore. it is with much love that we dedicate this camera to our dear peek-lets, without whom we would never have reached this amazing milestone. it's been a great year, full of ups and downs, but you guys never gave up on us and kept coming back for more! we can never thank you enough for believing in us, and for chasing the same dream that we are chasing; spreading the word, the love and the passion for analogue photography, whether it’s with new old-school inventions or refurbished classics like this very special fed 5b from red army camera. so keep shooting and stay part of the ‘one shot, one movement’. xoxo, peek! see you soon (: Limited Run of 50 pieces worldwide. About the Camera: The FED 5B is a 35mm rangefinder camera produced by the FED factory in the Ukrainian city of Kharkov from 1977 until 1990. It came equipped with the Industar-61 L/D 55mm f/2.8 standard lens incorporating the rare-earth element lanthanum and a focal-plane shutter with speeds from 1s to 1/500s + B, flash sync up to 1/30s and a self-timer. The FED 5B is an updated FED 4, with cleaner lines to the top, a pop-up rewind knob in place of the thumb-wheel, a hot shoe, restyled film reminder/frame counter and meter rings, and the meter scale repositioned and converted from a match-needle to an EV-scaled device where the user manually transfers the meter reading to the calculator. Manufactured from the late '70s until the end of the Millenium, this crooner is definitely more than just a pretty boy. Re-covered in Peek!'s limited edition print, this is an unique beauty.
